mapper.insert: insert into single_board(board_num, board_list_num, user_id, user_nickname, board_subject, board_content, board_views, board_createdate, board_updatedate, board_deletedate, board_statecode) values(board_num_seq.nextval, #{boardListNum}, #{userId}, #{userNickname}, #{boardSubject} , #{boardContent}, '0', sysdate, null, null, '1')
mapper.select: select board_num boardNum, board_list_num boardListNum, user_id userId, user_nickname userNickname, board_subject boardSubject, board_content boardContent, board_views boardViews, board_createDate boardCreatedate, board_updatedate boardUpdatedate, board_deletedate boardDeletedate, board_statecode boardStatecode from single_board where board_num = #{boardNum}
